languages.text: {n}Вы стараетесь подстроиться под пение ксеноса, но вам не удается сосредоточиться. Один мотив неожиданно сменяет другой, а ритм то и дело меняется, сбивая с толку.{/n}
{n}You try to add your voice to the song, but you find it difficult to follow the music. One motif is suddenly replaced by another, and the shifting rhythms leave you confused.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы стараетесь подстроиться под пение ксеноса, но вам не удается сосредоточиться. Один мотив неожиданно сменяет другой, а ритм то и дело меняется, сбивая с толку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You try to adjust your singing to that of Yrliet, but it only throws you off. One motif is suddenly replaced by another, and the rhythm keeps shifting, leaving you confused.{/n}
{n}You try to adjust your singing to that of Yrliet, but it only throws you off. One motif is suddenly replaced by another, and the rhythm keeps shifting, leaving you confused.{/n}
{n}You try to add your voice to the song, but you find it difficult to follow the music. One motif is suddenly replaced by another, and the shifting rhythms leave you confused.{/n}
{n}You try to add your voice to the song, but you find it difficult to follow the music. One motif is suddenly replaced by another, and the shifting rhythms leave you confused.{/n}
{n}You try to add your voice to the song, but you find it difficult to follow the music. One motif is suddenly replaced by another, and the shifting rhythms leave you confused.{/n}
{n}You try to add your voice to the song, but you find it difficult to follow the music. One motif is suddenly replaced by another, and the shifting rhythms leave you confused.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous essayez d'insérer votre voix dans la chanson, mais la musique est difficile à suivre. Vous êtes {mf|pris|prise} au dépourvu par les motifs qui s'enchaînent sans prévenir et ne parvenez pas à vous adapter aux changements de rythme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to add your voice to the song, but you find it difficult to follow the music. One motif is suddenly replaced by another, and the shifting rhythms leave you confused.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous essayez d'insérer votre voix dans la chanson, mais la musique est difficile à suivre. Vous êtes {mf|pris|prise} au dépourvu par les motifs qui s'enchaînent sans prévenir et ne parvenez pas à vous adapter aux changements de rythme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas seguir la melodía con la voz, pero no te resulta fácil. Los temas se reemplazan sin previo aviso, y los cambios de ritmo te confunden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to add your voice to the song, but you find it difficult to follow the music. One motif is suddenly replaced by another, and the shifting rhythms leave you confused.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas seguir la melodía con la voz, pero no te resulta fácil. Los temas se reemplazan sin previo aviso, y los cambios de ritmo te confunden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试着将你的声音融入和声当中，但你发现很难跟得上节奏。一个主题往往被另一个主题突然取而代之，不断变化的节奏让你困惑不已。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to add your voice to the song, but you find it difficult to follow the music. One motif is suddenly replaced by another, and the shifting rhythms leave you confused.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试着将你的声音融入和声当中，但你发现很难跟得上节奏。一个主题往往被另一个主题突然取而代之，不断变化的节奏让你困惑不已。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたも歌に参加しようとしたが、音楽を追うのに苦戦した。分かると思っても別のモチーフに変わってしまい、目まぐるしく変わるリズムがあなたを混乱させた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to add your voice to the song, but you find it difficult to follow the music. One motif is suddenly replaced by another, and the shifting rhythms leave you confused.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたも歌に参加しようとしたが、音楽を追うのに苦戦した。分かると思っても別のモチーフに変わってしまい、目まぐるしく変わるリズムがあなたを混乱させた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemühst dich, deine Stimme in das Lied einfließen zu lassen, doch es fällt dir schwer, der Musik zu folgen. Ein Motiv weicht plötzlich einem anderen, und die sich ständig wechselnden Rhythmen verwirren dich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to add your voice to the song, but you find it difficult to follow the music. One motif is suddenly replaced by another, and the shifting rhythms leave you confused.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemühst dich, deine Stimme in das Lied einfließen zu lassen, doch es fällt dir schwer, der Musik zu folgen. Ein Motiv weicht plötzlich einem anderen, und die sich ständig wechselnden Rhythmen verwirren dich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sesini şarkıya eklemeye çalışsan da müziği takip etmekte zorlanıyorsun. Bir motif, aniden bir başkasıyla yer değiştiriyor. Değişen ritimler, kafanı karıştırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to add your voice to the song, but you find it difficult to follow the music. One motif is suddenly replaced by another, and the shifting rhythms leave you confused.{/n}
